text: Approval for a design change that was primarily to replace the open water bath with water enclosed in silicone membranes.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name Achilles Express and is indicated for:  The Achilles Express ultrasonometer measures ultrasound variables of the os calcis to provide a clinical measure called Stiffness Index.  The Stiffness Index indicates risk of osteoporotic fracture in postmenopausal women comparable to bone mineral density (BMD) as measured by x-ray absorptiometry at the spine or hip.
